;System Preferences-Change the order of menu items in ADW, permit or disable notifications, and far more state-of-the-art configurations.
;
;Themes Preferences
;
;Right here you can set particular themes. There are free of charge and compensated themes on the Android Market created just for ADW. These themes can alter total sections of your cellphone this sort of as themed icons, menu shades, and backgrounds. In the Themes Preferences menu, you can download a lot more themes, set a entire theme, or just a specific element of the theme you want. Blend and match!
;
;Backup and Restore
;
;In the Backup and Restore menu, you can again up a certain concept. This arrives in helpful when you truly like the way your theme or layout is set, and it's possible you want to see what another theme seems to be like. Use this menu to back up your concept and come back again to it later without having obtaining to manually set almost everything up again.
;
;Homescreen Set up
;
;Most of you already know how to shift icons and add widgets, but there are a few additional suggestions to know that ADW packs together in the launcher.Edit Icons-Icons can be edited with ADW. To edit an icon, longpress it. A small menu will pop up.
;
;From this menu, you can remove the icon, edit it, handle the app, or share it with an individual else. If you desire to edit the icon, choose Edit and a new menu will open.
;
;Right here, you can rename the icon or change the icon's look. By downloading further themes, you will have extra icon packs which you can use to assign a diverse icon to a distinct app. Just contact the icon in the menu to adjust it. In this menu, you can also press the button (named Browser in this circumstance) to transform what the icon does. For case in point, if you downloaded a??tailor made browser like Skyfire, Opera, or Dolphin Browser, you can press the button to reassign what app opens when you open your browser.
;
;Dock Set up-In the preceding screenshots, you will notice that the latest (and default) set up is the three-Icon dock. You can customize which applications sit on that dock. Perhaps you don't want your contacts and browser on the dock. No problem Just longpress the icon you do want on the dock, drag it to the placement on the dock you want it, and then drop it (let go). Drag and drop. Go figure. Someone was in fact thinking of "ease of use" when creating this point.
;
;What I Like About This App
;
;ADW Launcher EX is a single of the greatest homescreen launchers out there since of its ability to customise virtually everything. You can transform the appearance of just about anything at all you want quite easily. You really don't have to root your cellphone to make these alterations either. Once you set ADW as your major launcher, it does its thing in the track record. It doesn't bother you with advertisements, freeze, or crash. There is also an RSS feature in this application.

;If you have rooted your Android mobile phone, you may possibly be curious about flashing a new ROM. In this assessment, I will give you a rundown of how MIUI stacks up.
;
;In the previous 6 months or so, I have tried nearly every single ROM available for my HTC Evo. There are many of them out there, and there are very a handful of excellent ones. Prior to you get started losing interest in this tale simply because you don't have an Evo, a lot of ROM's are suitable with a quantity of distinct handsets. Even however MIUI is operating on my HTC Evo, you probably will be in a position to install it on your mobile phone should you choose to do so.
;
;For individuals of you still new to rooting and flashing, I will supply a evaluation for MIUI alongside with some standard installation guidelines. This write-up assumes that you have acquired root, and you are all set to flash a new ROM.
;
;MIUI-Assessment Installation Ease
;

You go to the web site for the down load, down load the ROM onto your root folder, and flash. This ROM has its origins in the Far East, so significantly of the ROM is not in English. That is why you would also download and install the language pack from the web site right right after the ROM. Really don't fret about finding puzzled correct now directions will comply with at the end of the write-up.
